meanings.definition: The envelope of gases surrounding the earth or another planet.
meanings.sent1: The atmosphere felt fresh and clean after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The atmosphere in the classroom was tense during the exam.
meanings.sent3: The atmosphere at the party was so lively that even the shyest person danced.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the stadium was electric as the home team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere of the forest at night was eerie, with shadows dancing in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: The pervading tone or mood of a place, situation, or work of art.
meanings.sent1: The atmosphere of the movie was suspenseful from start to finish.
meanings.sent2: The atmosphere of the restaurant was cozy and welcoming.
meanings.sent3: The atmosphere at the comedy show was so light-hearted that everyone left with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the painting conveyed a sense of tranquility and peace.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere of the city streets at night was filled with excitement and energy.
